subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 21 points and 7 assists, and Chris Bosh scored 18 points as the visiting Miami Heat beat the Orlando Magic, 120-92, on Wednesday night.
snippet: LeBron James had 21 points and 7 assists, and Chris Bosh scored 18 points as the visiting Miami Heat beat the Orlando Magic, 120-92, on Wednesday night.
